title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, and embed with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex reader & LLM implementation to plug Ollama models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that connects to local Ollama instances; supports multi-user, docs, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to chat, stream, and manage models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with conversation history, persona prompts, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns local Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in Docker or Podman.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that consumes Ollama’s OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n workflow node for chatting with Ollama models inside no-code automations.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed APIs and streaming support for Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST endpoints with async views.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert and upload Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfiles automatically.
